name: The Meridian Shard RPG - An indie game.
blurb: A wild adventure with hopelessly flawed characters steeped in a supernatural tale of courage, sacrifice, secrets, and shenanigans.

rewards.reward: Thank you! Your kind gesture will be rewarded by having your name placed in a 2D cut-scene video set to music called 'Hard for the shard'. The video will be featured on the Ultimate Fantasy Studio website!
You will receive an official Ultimate Fantasy Studio magnetic postcard! Great for the fridge, or your robot's forehead. 'Where is it? I can't see it!' It drives them crazy.

{{{{{{{{{ NEW REWARD! }}}}}}}}} This latest reward is perfect for new backers, and for existing backers who would like to raise their pledges for more content! You will receive 1 special edition ebook in pdf, kindle, or ePub format featuring an action and humor-packed short story adventure based on one of the many side-quests in the The Meridian Shard!
You will receive a DRM-free digital copy of The Meridian Shard!

{ CD & DIGITAL SOUNDTRACK! }\r\nYou get the CD copy & the digital copy of the official Meridian Shard soundtrack in a full-color eco-pack case featuring 20+ original tracks! *Overseas orders add $5 shipping please!

{ DIGITAL REWARD COMBO! }
This latest reward is perfect for new backers, and for existing backers who would like to raise their pledges for more content and save by combining!
You will receive 1 special edition ebook in pdf, kindle, or ePub format featuring an action and humor-packed short story adventure based on one of the many side-quests in the The Meridian Shard!  
PLUS, a DRM-Free digital copy of the official Meridian Shard soundtrack, featuring 20+ original tracks!
You will receive a DRM-free digital copy of The Meridian Shard, plus an official Ultimate Fantasy Studio magnetic postcard!

You will receive 1 DRM-free Meridian Shard game cd in a full-color eco-pack case, 1 DRM-free digital copy of the game, and your name will be added to the upcoming 'Heroes' page of the official Ultimate Fantasy Studio website! Not only that, I will throw-in FREE shipping anywhere in Canada or the USA!\r\n*Overseas orders add $5 shipping & handling.

You will receive an official Meridian Shard 100% cotton t-shirt, along with 1 DRM-free Meridian Shard game cd in a full-color eco-pack case, and 1 DRM-free digital copy of the game as well! Plus,  FREE shipping anywhere in Canada or the USA!\r\nSweet 69! \r\n*Overseas orders add $10 shipping & handling.

{{{{{{{{{{ LIMITED 25 ONLY }}}}}}}}}}
Are you ready for this?
This fantastic reward offers a custom-developed, DRM-free, limited 'Warriorlock' edition game cd of The Meridian Shard in a full-color eco-pack case with the following features:
#1- An extra region with a 3-level dungeon that will take you deep into the ancient Preonite Mines of the Hydra Ranges. 
#2- An extra village hidden in a secret location with characters and items not available in the original game.
#3- An extra in-game spell book with 4 devastating demi god summons. 
PLUS, you'll get an official Meridian Shard 100% cotton t-shirt with a full color print of the cover on the front along with your game cd shipped to you for FREE anywhere in Canada or the USA!
*Overseas orders add $10 shipping & handling.
These additional game levels and features are only available in the Warriorlock edition and will easily require an additional 3+ months of development and testing just for you!

{{{{{{{{{{ LIMITED 12 ONLY }}}}}}}}}}\r\nThis is it; the big one; the boss; the mother load. You will be immortalized in the game by having your name and likeness used to create a character in the story! Will you be a shopkeeper? A hunter? A foul-mouthed village derelict drunkard with no pants? You just have to tell me what you want and I'll design it for you. On top of that, you will also have your name added to the in-game credits of both editions for all to see, AND you'll also receive all of the benefits of the above reward which includes FREE shipping anywhere in Canada or the USA! *Overseas orders add $10 shipping & handling.
